description: Configuration reggarding the detailed view of a group ("/groups/[dn]")
title: GroupDetailsConfig

cn.description: Configuration reggarding the "cn" attribute of the group

show.description: Wether or not to show the "cn" attribute in the "/groups/[dn]" page. @default true

description.description: Configuration reggarding the "description" attribute of the group

show.description: Wether or not to show the "description" attribute in the "/groups/[dn]" page. @default true

distinguishedName.description: Configuration reggarding the "distinguishedName" attribute of the group

show.description: Wether or not to show the "distinguishedName" attribute in the "/groups/[dn]" page. @default true

groupType.description: Configuration reggarding the "groupType" attribute of the group

show.description: Wether or not to show the "groupType" attribute in the "/groups/[dn]" page. @default true

mail.description: Configuration reggarding the "mail" attribute of the group

show.description: Wether or not to show the "mail" attribute in the "/groups/[dn]" page. @default true

member.description: Configuration reggarding the "member" attribute of the group

shortMember.description: If false the attribute "member" of the group will be shown as the full distinguishedName, else only the CN is shown. @default false

show.description: Wether or not to show the "member" attribute in the "/groups/[dn]" page. If false "shortMember" will be ignored @default true

sAMAccountName.description: Configuration reggarding the "sAMAccountName" attribute of the group

show.description: Wether or not to show the "sAMAccountName" attribute in the "/groups/[dn]" page. @default true

whenChanged.description: Configuration reggarding the "whenChanged" attribute of the group

show.description: Wether or not to show the "whenChanged" attribute in the "/groups/[dn]" page. @default true

whenCreated.description: Configuration reggarding the "whenCreated" attribute of the group

show.description: Wether or not to show the "whenCreated" attribute in the "/groups/[dn]" page. @default true
